metadata.title: CVE-2023-6152 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A user changing their email after signing up and verifying it can change itwithout verification in profile settings. The configuration option"verify_email_enabled" will only validate email only on sign up.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
